alert.note: Alert for Coastal Rockingham; Eastern Hillsborough; Interior Rockingham; Western And Central Hillsborough (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 13 at 8:06PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...An area of snow showers will affect southern York... Rockingham and southeastern Hillsborough Counties... At 806 PM EST...An area of heavy snow showers was along a line extending from near Exeter to near Nashua...and moving southeast AT 30 MPH. Locations impacted include... Nashua, Derry, Portsmouth, Hampton, Exeter, Kittery, Merrimack, Salem, Amherst, Litchfield, Hollis, Epping, Brentwood, Greenland, Seabrook, Rye, Hudson, Pelham, Stratham, and Newington. This includes the following highways... Interstate 93 between mile markers 0 and 16. Interstate 95 between mile markers 1 and 3. Interstate 95 in New Hampshire between mile markers 0 and 16. This also includes... Hampton Beach. * Visibilities may drop quickly but briefly to less than a half mile in this area of snow showers. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Rockingham; Eastern Hillsborough; Interior Rockingham; Western And Central Hillsborough
